centarithmetic

Start New Game


Instructions


Combine numbers at the bottom of the tree to reach the numbers at the top.



Available operations are add, subtract, multiply and divide.

Operations are always evaluated left to right.

Incorrect calculations are marked in red.



Points:

Every game starts out with 10,000 points.

Each move costs 100 points. Each incorrect calculation costs 500 points.

The game ends either when the entire board is filled correctly or the points run out.

For an additional challenge, turn on the timer!
